data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Est, Cameroon that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Est, Cameroon
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Est a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Est, Cameroon.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 361,386 people in the state of Est who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Est who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Est, Cameroon a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.section_summary:
the state of Est, Cameroon has a population of 836,900.

We estimate Est has 76,977 people who might know Jesus, 361,386 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 398,537 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 10 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Est.
